title: (x) Madden 2004 - Aurora Bd Cd (slanted & extended) {Yves}
content:
Hi folks   
   
im looking for the EA SPORTS font! any idea wich one it is?? (font) for the text not the logo   
expl: EA SPORTS "MADDEN2004" this font of MADDEN2004 or other game titles   
   
Thanks ![FONT MADDEN....](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191333im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/10765.gif)

 [‹ (x) Shelly - University Roman {Tiff}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191333/http:/typophile.com/node/130 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) AIGA annual report - Interstate {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191333/http:/typophile.com/node/126 "Go to next forum topic")
author: silverxstone

comments.content:
WOW!!!!! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191333im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Thanks Yves Peters that was fast and the right one   
   
Thanks you verry much   
   
Many greetings from switzerland

![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191333im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Mey be you know also the font of the EA SPORTS logo??   
   
I ![EASPORTS](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191333im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/10768.jpg)

Maybe I don't. ;)   
   
The 'SPORTS' is reminiscent of [Agency Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191333/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font_frames.tpl?cart=10529193847128493&fontname=AgencyFB), but   
not quite. It's possibly custom drawn, as there are a   
number of weight inconsistencies in the characters   
(see the tail of the 'R').The 'EA' is definitely custom   
drawn.
Or they they had a condensed version and extended it. Oof! You can tell that this was pulled horizontally. The vertical proportions are wrong.
